entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 11:57 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.1°C

Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -27.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
